titleStmt.title: Epigrams of all sorts, made at divers times on several occasions by Richard Flecknoe.
titleStmt.author: Flecknoe, Richard, d. 1678?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and Will. Crook ...,

notesStmt.note: Unpaged with special t.p. (p. [1]-[20] at end): Epigrams divine and moral dedicated to Her Majesty. [S.l. : s.n.], 1670.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
